properties.address: Brynmill Community Centre, Swansea, West Glamorgan SA2 0BP
properties.description: This warm hub offers a friendly and welcoming space to all. We meet every Thursday from 11.00am - 1pm and provide as much tea/coffee/squash and biscuits together with a bacon roll for a donation of just Â£2.00. Come along and meet new and old friends, local councillors and your local area coordinator.
properties.title: Brynmill Community Centre

properties.address: Pantygwydr Baptist Church, West Glamorgan SA2 0HN
properties.description: A wellbeing cafe for adults who feel isolated whether through health, loneliness or just needing company and social contact. We provide a quiet shared space where it's OK to not be OK. There are opportunities to come and share a hobby, learn a new one, enjoy the peace in our quiet area or chat and relax over a cup of tea or coffee. Optional prayer times are held for anyone who would like to join us. We are available Tuesdays between 2.00 pm and 4.00 pm
properties.title: Renew @The Stream
